replies.bodyText: You are right. As I started from Statement I didn't really consider this in the context of e.g. Model. Even though the converted data will be OK (you can reach the subject/predicate/object of the rdf:Statement) I agree it would be best to have a consistent mapping for identical triples. I just committed a fix that uses the triple's stringValue() + base64 encoding to derive the BNode ID. It uses SimpleValueFactory (before it used the passed value factory) to ensure that you get the ID you want. I also extended the tests to cover this case.
